convlab.modules.policy.user.policy module¶

The policy base class for user bot.

class convlab.modules.policy.user.policy.UserPolicy[source]¶

Bases: object

Base model for user policy model.

init_session()[source]¶

Restore after one session

predict(state, sys_action)[source]¶

Predict an user act based on state and preorder system action. :param state: Dialog state. :type state: tuple :param sys_action: Preorder system action.s :type sys_action: tuple

Returns:User act. session_over (boolean): True to terminate session, otherwise session continues. reward (float): Reward given by the user.
Return type:action (tuple)
